content: Compare Roman military tactics with modern armies, particularly focusing on [the Roman legion's formation and tactics](https://www.worldhistory.org/Roman_Legion/) and [modern military doctrine](https://www.army.mil/article/242439/army_doctrine_publication_3_90_offense_and_defense). How do the principles of maneuver warfare and unit cohesion compare between ancient and modern forces? Consider both the [logistical aspects](https://www.britannica.com/topic/Roman-army) and the psychological factors that influence military effectiveness across these vastly different eras.
